text: [Music]
today growing enterprises are looking to
augment existing on-premises wi-fi
networks with 4g lte and 5g cellular
technology for a number of reasons
reliable low-latency connectivity
long-range outdoor coverage predictable
network behavior
granular application and device control
increasing number of connected devices
however getting a private cellular
network up and running has been a
time-consuming and complicated process
for even the most skilled it
professionals that changes now and it's
much simpler than you think
aws private 5g is a managed service from
aws that enables enterprises to easily
deploy operate and scale private
cellular networks with just a few clicks
on the aws console customers can
eliminate months of complex planning and
integration to get started simply
specify the location where you want to
build a private cellular network the
network capacity you need and the number
of devices to be connected aws then
delivers pre-integrated hardware and
software components to set up a network
that meet your requirements power on aws
private 5g to automatically configure
and activate the cellular network and
simply plug in the sims into your
devices to complete setup
you can then create customized bandwidth
latency and quality of service qos
profiles for groups of devices or
applications and pricing is based on the
network coverage and capacity you need
not the number of connected devices
making this an ideal solution for iot
intensive applications like smart
manufacturing
no more long procurement processes no
need to negotiate with multiple vendors
no integration specialist required
no expensive price tag get ready for a
more reliable network and better
connectivity
you
